title: Prepare Camera-Ready Paper
description: Prepare your Camera-Ready Paper as per the "Instruction to prepare Camera Ready Paper."

title: Reply to Reviewers
description: Prepare reply to reviewers as per the instructions (Instruction to prepare reply to reviewers).

title: Registration Fee
description: Deposit Registration fee. Visit Registration Link or Explara.

title: Update Author Details
description: Update detail of all co-authors on Microsoft CMT.

title: Upload Documents
description: Upload all the documents (carefully go through Instruction to submit final files) through Microsoft CMT under Author Console using link "Create Camera Ready Submission".

title: Final Confirmation
description: After Registration, please submit your information through Google Form.
